data.text: Teman nui Elifaze kpɔɛi zeɠeni, é ɠɛ ma:
«Ɠima nui ɠa zoo nɛi é ɓɔɛ eɠɛ nɔ fiilɛi?
Kpɔɛ wafuungiti ka a ɓɔɠɔ maalobo da,
Ɗa GALA bɔɔlɔ vai ɠaaʋalasu ba,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɗa-vaaɠaazagi ɠa é losu è-laaʋɛ luɠɔ,
Nɔ̀un nà laade, kɛlɛ è-laaʋɛ ɓɔɠɔi ɠa é è ʋeelalazu.
Ɗa ɠa è ga nu mɔungi sɔlɔɔgai eteai zu ɓaa?
È naa mɛnini, nii é woni GALA ná-maaɓɔgi zu?
Leeni ɠa è kwɛɛ, nii gi la kwɛɛ?
Undeɠa ɠolegiti ta gi zaama, kɛwola wɔlɔiti,
GALA ná-gaanɛɛnɛ wooiti ta è ɠaazu ga faa go ɓaa,
Miná ɠa è-yii liizu ga ɗe ná?
Ɗa zoosu è yiiɠaawana GALA ma,
Nu vului ɠa zoo ɠale é ɲade?
Anɛɛ geezuɠeela ɲadegaiti, GALA ge la laani ti la,
Nuɓusɛi nɔnɔi ɠa ga lee, nii ɲɔuɗai, é ɠɔzɔ,
Nà è ɠalasu, woilo gòoi ma.
nii ɠima nuiti ti daazeelini,
Tiya ɠila nɔ ɠa zooi veeni ti ya,
«Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa lɔ kpɔlɔi nɔ zu sii ma voloiti pɛ su.
Zɔngɔ wooi é nu maaluazu, naa ɠa wosu goizu.
É la laani da ga kuai ɠa ɓudɛzu maazu,
Toɠa leʋeteʋesu, mini ɠa a daamianigi ɠa ná?
Ʋoluɠulai ta ziiɓɔlɔi ta maaluazu,
Mazɔlɔɔ é yeeɓuunni GALA daalɔɠɔma,
É ɠɔgi loga, é ɗa li laalɛɛzu GALA bu,
Ma wulɔi gaazuʋɛ maalɔɔɠuai,
Taai niiti ti woloai, miná ɠa é liini, é zei ná,
É la mɔ zooga é ʋa ɠɛ ga naavolo nu, ná-sɔlɔɔgi la mɔ wuzeɠea,
É la zooga ʋelazu kpidii ʋa.
Wafuun fai ɠa é ɠitogai ba. Kɛlɛ toɠa ɓɔɠɔ yaavazu,
Naa laa ɠa zeeli aisa sii ma voloiti ti ʋa ɓe,
Toɠa ɓɔɠɔ maaɓezeɠele eɠɛ leezɛn ansaɠɔgi ma waa ɓiini,
Mazɔlɔɔ faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ná-pɛlɛyeɠei la ɓuɠua,
Nii é ɠisiɛzu faa ɲɔi zu, toɠa sɔlɔɔ ga maanɔɠɔi.
